fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 128.11 lakh crore compared with Rs 418.61 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 declined 132.70 points or 0.74% to settle at 17,859.45. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 0.28% to 15.025. ICICI Bank, Bajaj Finance and RIL were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The January 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 25 January 2023.
